plot: Father Jack dies after drinking floor polish, leaving Ted and Dougal an inheritance.

Father Jack collapses after drinking too much floor polish and a visiting nun pronounces him dead. A solicitor arrives and tells Ted and Dougal that Jack had saved up half a million pounds, which they can split between them provided they hold a vigil by his coffin to ensure that he is not buried alive. The vigil duly goes ahead with the pair reminiscing on Jack's past but unfortunately for them the effects of the floor polish are only temporary and Jack turns out to be far from dead.—don @ minifie-1
